item.description:
Come and help us plan the 2012 "Baked Beanstalk" weekend!  We need to continue organizing our efforts to host a fun-filled weekend for members of the BBTC and other TCI clubs in the summer of 2012.  There are many tasks still to be done.  Note the flyer on the TCIWeekends website.  www.tciweekends.com

Jan wants you to show up hungry, but it helps if you let him know that you're coming!  So plan to come over with an appetite and a headful of ideas.
item.name: Boston 2012 Weekend Planning Meeting
